articles.title: New school year begins in Korea
50th anniversary of Popular Uprising on Jeju island marked
articles.content:
New school year begins in Korea
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- A new school year has begun at schools of all levels in Korea after full preparations to meet the requirement of the developing revolution and scientific and technological development.
   Ceremonies for starting the new school year were held at schools across the country on Wednesday.
   Present at the ceremonies were party and government officials who congratulated new students and pupils and sat in at their first class. 
   Talking with teachers and pupils, they encouraged them to greater success in education and study, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of education.

articles.title: Preparatory committees formed abroad to mark Sun's Day
articles.content:
50th anniversary of popular uprising on Jeju island marked
 Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Ri Sang Chol, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the National Democratic Front of South Korea, published a statement on Wednesday marking the 50th anniversary of the popular uprising on Jeju island.
   The uprising was a righteous anti-U.S. resistance for national salvation staged by islanders on April 3, 1948 in protest against the may 10 "separate elections" intended to ruin the nation.
   Ri said the patriotic resistance fully demonstrated the invincible spirit and strong will of the Korean nation to achieve the reunification and independence of the country by itself, rejecting the U.S. imperialists' intervention.
   The people in the south, he said, should concentrate efforts on the anti-U.S. struggle for independence to terminate the U.S. colonial rule in the spirit displayed by the islanders 50 years ago.
   What is important in the struggle is to get all the unequal treaties and agreements with the United States abrogated and the U.S. troops withdrawn from South Korea without delay, he contended.
   He stressed that political parties and organizations in the south should accept the proposal put forward by those of the north at their joint meeting,  take the stand of pro-north reconciliation and check the war moves against the north.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on crimes of "ANSP"
articles.content:
Preparatory committees formed abroad to mark Sun's Day
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- Preparatory committees were formed in different countries to commemorate Sun's Day.
   An inaugural meeting of the Equatorial Guinean preparatory committee was held on March 25. The Minister of state of the presidency in charge of missions was elected its chairman.
   He said President Kim Il Sung was a great man who brought the dawn of freedom and happiness to the Korean people and the world's progressive people. It is quite natural to significantly commemorate his birthday as Sun's Day, the chairman stressed.
   He said the great leader is alive as the sun in the hearts of the Equatorial Guinean people and the progressive people of the world.
   An inaugural meeting of the Sunbula international friendship club preparatory committee of Libya for commemorating Sun's Day took place on March 24.
   Meanwhile, a meeting of the Czech preparatory committee was held in Prague on March 27.
   The meetings discussed programs of commemorative events.

articles.title: Commemorative bulletin for Sun's Day issued in Russia
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on crimes of "ANSP"
  Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The South Korean present rulers are crying for "reform" of the "Agency for National Security Planning," successor to the "Central Intelligence Agency," instead of its dissolution.
   In this regard Rodong Sinmun today carries a signed article headlined "review of crime-woven ANSP." 
   The daily reads in part:
   The "ANSP" was built by a scenario of the United States, the mission of which is to block the independent and democratic development of South Korean society and the reunification of the country for the sake of the security of the colonial fascist regime.
   It earns itself ill fame as an "emperor of fascism," a "government above government" and a hotbed of fascism, murder and plot.
   It is the real ruler exercising the absolute authority in South Korea. It chooses or ousts President, frames the political structure  and shapes and implements policies. It, a watchdog of the regime, has directed all its efforts to interrupting social progress. It has faked up cases to check predominance of the anti-"government" forces and save the dictatorial forces from a crisis.
   It clings to every conceivable means and method from watch, shadowing and tapping to torture and killing to obliterate justice.
   It is the "ANSP" that has plunged South Korea into a chronic economic crisis and brought the people's livelihood to failure. The "ANSP" appropriates a large amount of money collected from the people to its fabulous "budget. 
   It has also blocked national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
   Holding sway over inter-Korean dialogue, it has cracked down on those who visited the north or met with fellow countrymen from the north abroad as well as even those who talked about reunification, branding them as "spies," "pro-communist elements benefiting the enemy" and "security offenders."
   It, not content with groundless abuses of the north's system, has always manipulated the successive dictators attempt to overthrow it, issued "emergency action guidelines" to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north when they suffered a misfortune, laid hurdles in the way of humanitarian assistance of the international community, far from expressing sympathy with the countrymen who suffered  from devastating natural disasters.
   The attitude toward the dissolution of the "ANSP" is a criterion that distinguishes whether the present regime of South Korea is a "government for the people" or a "government of traitors" and whether it wants to improve the relations with the north and reunify the country or not.
   Anyone who truly wants  the security of the nation and the reunification of the country  should not hesitate to do something for the dissolution the "ANSP."

articles.title: Unique light comedy "Letter"
articles.content:
Commemorative bulletin for Sun's Day issued in Russia
Pyongyang, April 2 (KCNA) -- The Russian organizing committee for commemoration of Sun's Day released a bulletin headlined "Kim Il Sung, sun of mankind," "Juche Era and Sun's Day" on March 27.
   The bulletin praised President Kim Il Sung as a great thinker who showed the road ahead of humankind with sagacious ideas and as a legendary man who glorified all his life like the sun.
   Though he passed away his august name, ideas, exploits and traits remain long in the hearts of peoples, it said. 
   The Juche era means a new era of history started by him.
   April 15 this year, the first Sun's Day after its institution, is being commemorated splendidly by the Korean people and the progressive mankind, it stressed.
   The bulletin was distributed to political parties, organizations and press organs of Russia.
